game.name: Magrunner: Dark Pulse
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Magrunner: Dark Pulse is an action-puzzle game in which technology confronts the Cthulhu Mythos, penned by H.P. Lovecraft. Equipped with your Magtech glove, you must harness the ability to magnetically polarize and manipulate objects in the environment to survive and surpass challenging puzzles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Magrunner: Dark Pulse is an action-puzzle game in which technology confronts the Cthulhu Mythos, penned by H.P. Lovecraft. Equipped with your Magtech glove, you must harness the ability to magnetically polarize and manipulate objects in the environment to survive and surpass challenging puzzles.

reviewHighlights.text: 퍼즐 게임에 숨은 물건 찾기나 순발력을 요구하는 퍼즐은 없어야 한다 퍼즐 게임 할때마다 포탈이 괜히 걸작인게 아니구나 싶다
